errors.title: Badge variant 'info' doesn't exist
errors.symptom: Property 'info' does not exist on type BadgeVariant
errors.rootCause: OSYS design system uses specific variants: default, primary, gold, success, live, coming, warning, error. No 'info' or 'danger'.
errors.prevention: Check OSYSComponents.tsx for valid variants before using

errors.title: UserRole case mismatch
errors.rootCause: UserRole enum uses Capital first letter: 'Coach' not 'coach'
errors.solution: Use 'Coach', 'Parent', 'Fan', etc. with capital first letter
errors.prevention: Reference types.ts for exact UserRole values

errors.title: Credits field wrong name
errors.prevention: Credits come from AuthContext - no need to re-fetch

errors.title: Firestore permission denied
errors.rootCause: Security rules not updated for new collection or query pattern
errors.solution: Update firestore.rules with appropriate rules, then deploy
errors.prevention: Always update rules when adding new collections or changing query patterns

errors.title: Chunk load error after deploy
errors.symptom: Failed to fetch dynamically imported module
errors.rootCause: Old cached chunks don't match new build hashes
errors.solution: Handled by lazyWithRetry() in App.tsx - auto-reloads page
errors.prevention: Already handled, but consider cache-busting headers

errors.title: Sport-specific hardcoding
errors.rootCause: Hardcoded football positions instead of using sportConfig
errors.prevention: NEVER hardcode positions, stats, or sport-specific data
